009package FittingCircles;
010
011import java.util.Locale;
012
013//import Fitting.Display;
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.io.LogStream;
017import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType;
022import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
023
024public class Circle_Fit_Algebraic implements PlugIn {
025        
026        static {
027                LogStream.redirectSystem();
028                PrintPrecision.set(6);
029        }
030        
031        public static int N = 100;
032        public static double XC = 200;
033        public static double YC = 190;
034        public static double R = 150;
035        public static double Angle0 = 0;
036        public static double Angle1 = 45; // was Math.PI/4;
037        public static double SigmaNoise = 5.0; //2.0;
038        
039        static boolean DrawPoints = true;
040        static boolean DrawRealCircle = true;
041        static boolean DrawFitCircle = true;
042        
043        static CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType algType = FitType.Pratt;
044
045        @Override
046        public void run(String arg) {
047                
048                if (!runDialog()) {
049                        return;
050                }
051                
052                IJ.log("Algebraic fit type = " + algType);              
053//              String title = this.getClass().getSimpleName() + "-" + algType;
054                
055                GeometricCircle realCircle = new GeometricCircle(XC, YC, R);
056                IJ.log(" real: " + realCircle.toString());
057                
058                Pnt2d[] points = new imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.utils.CircleSampler(realCircle).getPoints(N, Angle0, Angle1, SigmaNoise);
059                
060                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
061                CircleFitAlgebraic fitter = CircleFitAlgebraic.getFit(algType, points);
062                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
063                
064                GeometricCircle fitCircle = fitter.getGeometricCircle();
065                if (fitCircle == null) {
066                        IJ.log("Algebraic fit: no result!");
067                        return;
068                }
069                IJ.log("  fit: " + fitCircle);
070                
071                IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error real = %.3f", realCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
072                IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error fit  = %.3f", fitCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
073        }
074        
075        // ------------------------------------------
076        
077        private boolean runDialog() {
078                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
079                
080                gd.addEnumChoice("fit method", algType);
081                gd.addCheckbox("DrawPoints", DrawPoints);
082                gd.addCheckbox("DrawRealCircle", DrawRealCircle);
083                gd.addCheckbox("DrawFitCircle", DrawFitCircle);
084                
085                gd.showDialog();
086                if (gd.wasCanceled())
087                        return false;
088                
089                algType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.class);
090                DrawPoints = gd.getNextBoolean();
091                DrawRealCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
092                DrawFitCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
093
094                return true;
095        }
096
097}
